attributes.action: YouTube should not be blocked in schools, at least not for educational purposes.
attributes.additional_details: "the circle song" for example this helps towards solving maths equations linking to circles e.g. finding the circumference
attributes.background: students may need to use this to increase their knowledge in schools and to have a greater understanding of the tasks they have been set. Although, to meet halfway students should only be allowed to  search educational things only.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be the responsibility of your school.
